Topic.Title: A Thought Concerning The GOOGLE Text Adventure

Posts.EditableText:
I just played the Google text adventure again.
(x × 2) + 21 - 15    - x = ?
2
--- That is funny stuff, right there! --- NOTE ---- If you haven't played the Google text adventure: - go to google_dot_com - Search for "text adventure" - As soon as the results come back, hit \ - You can now play a text adventure in your browser's dev-tools console! (Works in Chrome as well as Firefox.) --- ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/101266401-1b30f900-3714-11eb-9877-de801a5f57bb.png)
Posts.HTML:
I just played the Google text adventure again.

That is funny stuff, right there!

NOTE

If you haven't played the Google text adventure:

  • go to google_dot_com
  • Search for "text adventure"
  • As soon as the results come back, hit <F12>
  • You can now play a text adventure in your browser's dev-tools console! (Works in Chrome as well as Firefox.)

Posts.EditableText: what's that. Is that a problem? so funny
